messages.subject: MibuMySpace + Shinsenade + Makoto Film Dojo Updates
messages.msgSnippet: I held a contest for any creative multi-media expression of the Shinsengumi and received only 2 entries.  The prize was a hakama and haori from Japan, however
messages.messageBody:
I held a contest for any creative multi-media expression of the
Shinsengumi and received only 2 entries. The prize was a hakama and
haori from Japan, however the participants did not want to claim
their prize. So I used the money to get a paid LJ account now under
the supervision of Miralee http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/
(the blog is fed to http://www.shinsengumihq.com) the blog design is
by http://www.ai-dax.com

You may see films at the top of this page
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/MFD.htm

*I also installed a new image based navigation bar at the top of all
SHQ pages too, so just click on the links to take you to another
section of the site
-------------------------------------------------
Myspace has become a great way to meet new friends and network...how
would MIBUmyspace look like?

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/mibumyspace.jpg
[note: Dr. Matsumoto was the Dutch educated physician, "Miki" was
Itou's younger brother and captain in the Shinsengumi---we generally
make him considerably less intelligent and responsible than his
older sibling]

Housed at http://www.shinsengumihq.com/art.htm
-------------------------------------------------
If any Bakumatsu group needed a sports drink it would be the
Shinsengumi.

[setting = dojo]

Okita and Saitou decide to practice. The captain of the first
squad, exhausted from the activity and heat goes to the corner of
the room to get a drink from the cooler filled with ice.

Hijikata is enjoying the humid day by sitting in quiet contemplation
when Saitou rushes in, "Hijikata---come to the dojo right away,
something is wrong with Okita!"

The vice chief was shocked to see his beloved on the floor choking
and gasping. Hijikata he turns to the captain of the third
squad "you bastard, Saitou, you know how fragile my Okita is these
days now look at what you did!"

Hijikata draws Okita into his strong arms, "Okita, you're coughing
up blood again---why are you exerting yourself this way? Do you
want to leave me forever? For so long I've wanted to say...to say."

Okita reaches up to caress Hijikata's face ::dramatically:: "My oni,
you startle easily I was just coughing up this disgusting new
tropical flavored punch drink....
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/shinsenade.jpg , but if you had
something to say, speak now"

Hijikata (>_>X) "this was ... a joke?"

Saitou :: ROFL ::

Okita :: LMAO ::

Hijikata throws the bottle across the wooden floor
